justification: Shows minimal ToM: notes B’s title run but ignores B’s zero-RB philosophy and strong preference for rookies—making Cameron Scott a core, unlikely trade piece. Two-for-one ask (Scott + Rodriguez) for Taylor feels value-heavy for A and clashes with B’s tendencies. Acceptance at 0.75 is optimistic. Rationale is brief and lacks engagement with B’s consensus-driven mindset or roster construction.
